author: Chris Roche
content: As a long time shanty singer who went to sea to discover how the songs could be used to work ship deep sea and late organiser of the British group The Shanty Crew I hope that shanty singing aboard WAVERTREE will not be a one off long may it continue I expect the group of ladies The Johnson Girls will be involved somewhere along the line, say hi for me.

author: Jan Christensen
content: For the first time since Hurricane Sandy, sea music is back at the Seaport. it feels good.
